info.title: Location
info.description:
The service enables you to create, read, update, and delete locations through an API call. You can perform these activities from a source system outside SAP S/4HANA Cloud.
The service is based on the OData protocol.

x-sap-shortText: Create, read, update and delete locations in SAP S/4HANA Cloud using this synchronous inbound service

values.text: [Order-Based Transportation Consolidation â€“ Outbound(3EP)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/3EP " Link To BP ")
[Stock Transport Order-Based Transportation Consolidation(5XC)](https://me.sap.com/processnavigator/SolP/5XC " Link To BP ")

x-sap-extensible.description:
API can be extended by custom fields on the following business contexts (field usage for this API needs to be selected):
* Location (TM_LOCATION_ROOT)

[How to add an extension field to an API](https://help.sap.com/docs/SAP_S4HANA_CLOUD/0f69f8fb28ac4bf48d2b57b9637e81fa/ce819b8557194ae0aa180ba4ac6a04de.html)

post.description:
Group multiple requests into a single request payload, see [Batch Requests](http://docs.oasis-open.org/odata/odata/v4.01/odata-v4.01-part1-protocol.html#sec_BatchRequests).

*Please note that "Try it out" is not supported for this request.*

multipart/mixed;boundary=request-separat.example:
--request-separator
Content-Type: application/http
Content-Transfer-Encoding: binary

GET Location HTTP/1.1
Accept: application/json


--request-separator--

multipart/mixed.example:
--response-separator
Content-Type: application/http

HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Type: application/json

{...}
--response-separator--
